3: Deep inside her M.I.N.D., someone seems to be waiting for Lucia.
But she quickly realizes that it is actually 'Lucia' of the past.
The projection of her past stands in the center of the platform in her M.I.N.D., slowly splitting into two similar-looking yet drastically different projections, walking toward different directions.
It seems that this is where we diverge.
Alpha, I will accept your everything—your pain, your choices. So...
She stands on the edge of where their M.I.N.D.s connect and reaches out to Lucia of the past. The moment she touches her, the M.I.N.D. starts to billow and surge...
